column4: hey guys, I just formatted and installed breezy and now my resolution is stuck at 640x480 and I know it goes higher (it did w/ hoary) and ctrl shift +/- doesn't work
how do I edit the xorg conf to make it 1024 or something
have you tried system -> preference -> resolution ?
yes, stuck on 640 wickedpuppy
fixres?
have you installed drivers for ya gfx card ?
ahhh privmsg
uhm, well this is just a fileserver box I VNC into, it has generic video card
oh in that case pls check out the pm :P
I am, lets see if it works...
allll righty... running the config script again... now what driver is it heh
intel i810 seems right
should I try a generic VGA or actually shoot for the right chipset?
i used that chip before .... i got to 1024 X 768 ... check ya monitor settings
well, I have a geforce 6800 in this box
if you can call it acceleration :P
use kernel framebuffer interface?
yes? no? make a difference..
Xine is pretty sweet
hehe
looks like that worked, thanks bro
